<JD_START>
Job Title: Reverse Mortgage Loan Officer

Location: Nottingham, MD

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Sales

Description:
Reverse Mortgage leads provided on a self-gen commission structure. No, we don't pad our rate sheet - we use true raw broker pricing!
About Us:We are a leading financial institution committed to providing exceptional financial solutions to our clients. Our team is expanding, and we are currently seeking experienced and dedicated Reverse Mortgage Loan Officers to join us. If you are passionate about helping seniors secure their financial future and have a proven track record in the mortgage industry, we want to hear from you.Job Description:As a Reverse Mortgage Loan Officer, you will be responsible for educating and guiding clients through the reverse mortgage process, from initial consultation to closing. You will work closely with seniors to understand their financial needs and provide tailored solutions that enable them to leverage the equity in their homes to secure a comfortable retirement.Key Responsibilities:Conduct in-depth consultations with potential clients to assess their financial situation and recommend suitable reverse mortgage products.Develop and maintain relationships with clients, providing exceptional service and support throughout the loan process.Stay abreast of industry regulations, standards, and products to ensure compliance and offer the best solutions to clients.Collaborate with internal teams, including underwriting and processing, to ensure smooth and timely loan closings.Participate in community events and seminars to educate seniors about the benefits of reverse mortgages and generate new business opportunities.Requirements:Minimum of 2 years of experience as a Mortgage Loan Officer, with a strong preference for experience in reverse mortgages.Valid NMLS license.In-depth knowledge of reverse mortgage products, regulations, and the loan process.Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build trust and rapport with elderly clients.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a detail-oriented approach to managing the loan process.Ability to work onsite and travel locally as needed to meet with clients.We Offer:Aggressive commission structure.LEADS LEADS LEADS.Comprehensive benefits package, including health, dental, and vision insurance, and retirement plans.Professional development opportunities and ongoing training to help you grow your career.A supportive and collaborative work environment where your contributions are valued and recognized.How to Apply:If you are a motivated and experienced Reverse Mortgage Loan Officer looking to make a positive impact in the lives of seniors, we encourage you to apply. Please send your resume and a cover letter detailing your experience and why you are the perfect fit for this role.
Join our team and help us empower seniors to live more financially secure and fulfilling lives. We look forward to hearing from you!

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
